name: SMOK: Legend of the Laid-Back Heroes
summary: An RPG Maker fangame themed around the talents of Hololive. To prevent the awakening of the Demon Lord, the main character, accompanied by Subaru, Mio, Okayu, and Korone, embarks on a very absurd adventure.

videos.title: 【Hololive Fan-Made Game】SMOK: Legend of the Laid-Back Heroes
